nodes.documentation:
A crowdsale token.
 * An ERC-20 token designed specifically for crowdsales with investor protection and 
further development path.
 * - The token transfer() is disabled until the crowdsale is over
- The token contract gives an opt-in upgrade path to a new contract
- The same token can be part of several crowdsales through approve() mechanism
- The token can be capped (supply set in the constructor) 
  or uncapped (crowdsale contract can mint new tokens)
nodes.name: DayToken
DayToken
setInitialBlockTimestamp

nodes.documentation: check if mintining power is activated and Day token and Timemint transfer is enabled
nodes.name: isDayTokenActivated

nodes.documentation:
to check if an id is a valid contributor
@param _id contributor id to check.
nodes.name: isValidContributorId

nodes.documentation:
to check if an address is a valid contributor
@param _address  contributor address to check.
nodes.name: isValidContributorAddress

nodes.documentation:
In case of Team address check if lock-in period is over (returns true for all non team addresses)
@param _address team address to check lock in period for.
nodes.name: isTeamLockInPeriodOverIfTeamAddress
setMintingDec

nodes.documentation: When token is released to be transferable, enforce no new tokens can be created.
nodes.name: releaseTokenTransfer

nodes.documentation: Allow upgrade agent functionality kick in only if the crowdsale was success.
nodes.name: canUpgrade

nodes.documentation: Owner can update token information here
nodes.name: setTokenInformation
getPhaseCount

nodes.documentation:
Returns current day number since minting epoch 
or zero if initialBlockTimestamp is in future or its DayZero.
nodes.name: getDayCount
setInitialMintingPowerOf

nodes.documentation:
Returns minting power of a particular id.
@param _id Contribution id whose minting power is to be returned
nodes.name: getMintingPowerById

nodes.documentation:
Returns minting power of a particular address.
@param _adr Address whose minting power is to be returned
nodes.name: getMintingPowerByAddress
availableBalanceOf

nodes.documentation:
Updates the balance of the specified id in its structure and also in the balances[] mapping.
returns true if successful.
Only for internal calls. Not public.
@param _id id whose balance is to be updated.
nodes.name: updateBalanceOf

nodes.documentation:
Standard ERC20 function overridden.
Returns the balance of the specified address.
Calculates the balance on fly only if it is a minting address else 
simply returns balance from balances[] mapping.
For public calls.
@param _adr address whose balance is to be returned.
nodes.name: balanceOf

nodes.documentation:
Standard ERC20 function overridden.
Returns the balance of the specified id.
Calculates the balance on fly only if it is a minting address else 
simply returns balance from balances[] mapping.
For public calls.
@param _id address whose balance is to be returned.
nodes.name: balanceById

nodes.documentation: Returns totalSupply of DAY tokens.
nodes.name: getTotalSupply
updateTimeMintBalance

nodes.documentation:
Function to update balance of sender's Timemint
returns true if balance updated, false otherwise
nodes.name: updateMyTimeMintBalance
transfer

nodes.documentation: Standard ERC20 Standard Token function overridden. Added Team address vesting period lock.
nodes.name: transferFrom
addContributor
sellMintingAddress

nodes.documentation: Function to be called by minting address in order to cancel the sale of their TimeMint
nodes.name: cancelSaleOfMintingAddress

nodes.documentation: Function to be called by any user to get a list of all On Sale TimeMints
nodes.name: getOnSaleIds
getSellingStatus
buyMintingAddress

nodes.documentation:
Transfer minting address from one user to another
Gives the transfer-to address, the id of the original address
returns true if successful and false if not.
@param _to address of the user to which minting address is to be tranferred
nodes.name: transferMintingAddress

nodes.documentation:
Function to allow seller to get back their deposited amount of day tokens(minBalanceToSell) and 
offer made by buyer after successful sale.
Throws if sale is not successful
nodes.name: fetchSuccessfulSaleProceed

nodes.documentation:
Function that lets a seller get their deposited day tokens (minBalanceToSell) back, if no buyer turns up.
Allowed only after expiryBlockNumber
Throws if any other state other than EXPIRED
nodes.name: refundFailedAuctionAmount

nodes.documentation:
Function to add a team address as a contributor and store it's time issued to calculate vesting period
Called by owner
nodes.name: addTeamTimeMints
postAllocateAuctionTimeMints
allocateNormalTimeMints

nodes.documentation:
Function to release token
Called by owner
nodes.name: releaseToken
